strata1.common.money
Interface CurrencyExchanger

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCurrencyExchanger
public interface CurrencyExchanger

Provides functionality for converting Money object between different Currencys.

Author:
Sapientia Systems
Naming Conventions:
Naming Conventions

Method Summary
 Money exchange(Currency currency, Money money)
          Converts money in one currency into the equivalent the specified currency at the current exchange rate.
 Money exchange(Currency currency, Money money, DateTime date)
          Converts money in one currency into the equivalent the specified currency at the exchange rate on the specified date.
 Collection<Currency> getSupportedCurrencies()
           
 

Method Detail

getSupportedCurrencies

Collection<Currency> getSupportedCurrencies()
Returns:
a collection of the currencies supported by this CurrencyExchanger.

exchange

Money exchange(Currency currency,
               Money money)
Converts money in one currency into the equivalent the specified currency at the current exchange rate.

Parameters:
currency - the "to" currency
money - the money amount in the "from" currency
Returns:
money amount in the "to" currency

exchange

Money exchange(Currency currency,
               Money money,
               DateTime date)
Converts money in one currency into the equivalent the specified currency at the exchange rate on the specified date.

Parameters:
currency - the "to" currency
money - the money amount in the "from" currency
date - the date of the effective exchange rate
Returns:
money amount in the "to" currency
